snippet: One of the judges the reporters were told to monitor, Elizabeth Gonzalez, is handling a wrongful dismissal lawsuit filed in 2010 against Sheldon Adelson and his casino company.
abstract: Las Vegas Review-Journal discloses its reporters were directed by corporate management to monitor three local judges just before paper's acquisition by Sheldon Adelson, one of whom was overseeing wrongful dismissal suit involving Adelson, wealthy casino mogul; investigation took place despite protest from newsroom, but resulting story was never published.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and BARRY MEIER

lead_paragraph: One of the judges the reporters were told to monitor, Elizabeth Gonzalez, is handling a wrongful dismissal lawsuit filed in 2010 against Sheldon Adelson and his casino company.

headline.main: Las Vegas Review-Journal’s Owners Told Reporters to Monitor Judges
headline.print_headline: Newspaper’s Owner Told Reporters to Monitor Judge Overseeing an Adelson Case
